name: Trash Rocket
description:
'Trash Rocket', a 48 hour solo game jam developed during the GMTK Game Jam 2021, about joining together nearby trash to power a spaceship.

You command a crew of space cowboys who find themselves without enough fuel to return home. Dispatch workers to lasso nearby trash for spare parts, while you protect your vessel from oncoming threats, and then rally everyone together to search for more trash.

Can you refuel your ship and get back home?

Mission:
  • Fill up the fuel gauge and get back home.
Controls: 
  • WASD - Free Move Camera (when no troops
  • Left Click/Drag - Select Troops
  • Right Click / F - Move Troops to Location
  • Q / E - Cycle Through Troops
  • Middle Mouse Button / Space - Secondary Action (Cowboy Fires Laser / Ship Regroups Crew)
Fuel:
  • +100 : connect part to ship
  • -100: lose part from ship
  • -20: move ship
Credits:
  • Myself: Game Designer, Pixel Art, Coding, Music
  • freesound.org: Sounds
